thread.title: Cynthia
thread.title_full: Personalized Paper Manufacturing Group reviewed by Cynthia

author: Cynthia
title: Cynthia
text: We got our order of note pads last week and are very pleased with them. The price was the main key to getting our business. The order was delivered before we expected it. That was a pleasant surprise. If I had to complain about anything it would be the backing on the note pads. We expected it to be a little heavier (like light weight cardboard) rather than just a piece of construction paper. But, overall, we're happy with the order. We'll probably use them again in the future.
